40namespace webrtc {
41namespace {
42
43bool UpdateCaptureCallCounterOnSkippedBlocks() {
44 return !field_trial::IsEnabled(
45 "WebRTC-Aec3RenderBufferCallCounterUpdateKillSwitch");
46}
47
48class RenderDelayBufferImpl final : public RenderDelayBuffer {
49 public:
50 RenderDelayBufferImpl(const EchoCanceller3Config& config,
51 int sample_rate_hz,
52 size_t num_render_channels);
53 RenderDelayBufferImpl() = delete;
54 ~RenderDelayBufferImpl() override;
55
56 void Reset() override;
57 BufferingEvent Insert(
58 const std::vector<std::vector<std::vector<float>>>& block) override;
59 BufferingEvent PrepareCaptureProcessing() override;
60 void HandleSkippedCaptureProcessing() override;
61 bool AlignFromDelay(size_t delay) override;
62 void AlignFromExternalDelay() override;
63 size_t Delay() const override { return ComputeDelay(); }
64 size_t MaxDelay() const override {
65 return blocks_.buffer.size() - 1 - buffer_headroom_;
66 }
67 RenderBuffer* GetRenderBuffer() override { return &echo_remover_buffer_; }
68
69 const DownsampledRenderBuffer& GetDownsampledRenderBuffer() const override {
70 return low_rate_;
71 }
72
73 int BufferLatency() const;
74 void SetAudioBufferDelay(int delay_ms) override;
75 bool HasReceivedBufferDelay() override;
76
77 private:
78 static int instance_count_;
79 std::unique_ptr<ApmDataDumper> data_dumper_;
80 const Aec3Optimization optimization_;
81 const EchoCanceller3Config config_;
82 const bool update_capture_call_counter_on_skipped_blocks_;
83 const float render_linear_amplitude_gain_;
84 const rtc::LoggingSeverity delay_log_level_;
85 size_t down_sampling_factor_;
86 const int sub_block_size_;
87 BlockBuffer blocks_;
88 SpectrumBuffer spectra_;
89 FftBuffer ffts_;
90 absl::optional<size_t> delay_;
91 RenderBuffer echo_remover_buffer_;
92 DownsampledRenderBuffer low_rate_;
93 AlignmentMixer render_mixer_;
94 Decimator render_decimator_;
95 const Aec3Fft fft_;
96 std::vector<float> render_ds_;
97 const int buffer_headroom_;
98 bool last_call_was_render_ = false;
99 int num_api_calls_in_a_row_ = 0;
100 int max_observed_jitter_ = 1;
101 int64_t capture_call_counter_ = 0;
102 int64_t render_call_counter_ = 0;
103 bool render_activity_ = false;
104 size_t render_activity_counter_ = 0;
105 absl::optional<int> external_audio_buffer_delay_;
106 bool external_audio_buffer_delay_verified_after_reset_ = false;
107 size_t min_latency_blocks_ = 0;
108 size_t excess_render_detection_counter_ = 0;
109
110 int MapDelayToTotalDelay(size_t delay) const;
111 int ComputeDelay() const;
112 void ApplyTotalDelay(int delay);
113 void InsertBlock(const std::vector<std::vector<std::vector<float>>>& block,
114 int previous_write);
115 bool DetectActiveRender(rtc::ArrayView<const float> x) const;
116 bool DetectExcessRenderBlocks();
117 void IncrementWriteIndices();
118 void IncrementLowRateReadIndices();
119 void IncrementReadIndices();
120 bool RenderOverrun();
121 bool RenderUnderrun();
122};
123
124int RenderDelayBufferImpl::instance_count_ = 0;
125
126RenderDelayBufferImpl::RenderDelayBufferImpl(const EchoCanceller3Config& config,
127 int sample_rate_hz,
128 size_t num_render_channels)
129 : data_dumper_(
130 new ApmDataDumper(rtc::AtomicOps::Increment(&instance_count_))),
131 optimization_(DetectOptimization()),
132 config_(config),
133 update_capture_call_counter_on_skipped_blocks_(
134 UpdateCaptureCallCounterOnSkippedBlocks()),
135 render_linear_amplitude_gain_(
136 std::pow(10.0f, config_.render_levels.render_power_gain_db / 20.f)),
137 delay_log_level_(config_.delay.log_warning_on_delay_changes
138 ? rtc::LS_WARNING
139 : rtc::LS_VERBOSE),
140 down_sampling_factor_(config.delay.down_sampling_factor),
141 sub_block_size_(static_cast<int>(down_sampling_factor_ > 0
142 ? kBlockSize / down_sampling_factor_
143 : kBlockSize)),
144 blocks_(GetRenderDelayBufferSize(down_sampling_factor_,
145 config.delay.num_filters,
146 config.filter.refined.length_blocks),
147 NumBandsForRate(sample_rate_hz),
148 num_render_channels,
149 kBlockSize),
150 spectra_(blocks_.buffer.size(), num_render_channels),
151 ffts_(blocks_.buffer.size(), num_render_channels),
152 delay_(config_.delay.default_delay),
153 echo_remover_buffer_(&blocks_, &spectra_, &ffts_),
154 low_rate_(GetDownSampledBufferSize(down_sampling_factor_,
155 config.delay.num_filters)),
156 render_mixer_(num_render_channels, config.delay.render_alignment_mixing),
157 render_decimator_(down_sampling_factor_),
158 fft_(),
159 render_ds_(sub_block_size_, 0.f),
160 buffer_headroom_(config.filter.refined.length_blocks) {
161 RTC_DCHECK_EQ(blocks_.buffer.size(), ffts_.buffer.size());
162 RTC_DCHECK_EQ(spectra_.buffer.size(), ffts_.buffer.size());
163 for (size_t i = 0; i < blocks_.buffer.size(); ++i) {
164 RTC_DCHECK_EQ(blocks_.buffer[i][0].size(), ffts_.buffer[i].size());
165 RTC_DCHECK_EQ(spectra_.buffer[i].size(), ffts_.buffer[i].size());
166 }
167
168 Reset();
169}
170
171RenderDelayBufferImpl::~RenderDelayBufferImpl() = default;
172
173// Resets the buffer delays and clears the reported delays.
174void RenderDelayBufferImpl::Reset() {
175 last_call_was_render_ = false;
176 num_api_calls_in_a_row_ = 1;
177 min_latency_blocks_ = 0;
178 excess_render_detection_counter_ = 0;
179
180 // Initialize the read index to one sub-block before the write index.
181 low_rate_.read = low_rate_.OffsetIndex(low_rate_.write, sub_block_size_);
182
183 // Check for any external audio buffer delay and whether it is feasible.
184 if (external_audio_buffer_delay_) {
185 const int headroom = 2;
186 size_t audio_buffer_delay_to_set;
187 // Minimum delay is 1 (like the low-rate render buffer).
188 if (*external_audio_buffer_delay_ <= headroom) {
189 audio_buffer_delay_to_set = 1;
190 } else {
191 audio_buffer_delay_to_set = *external_audio_buffer_delay_ - headroom;
192 }
193
194 audio_buffer_delay_to_set = std::min(audio_buffer_delay_to_set, MaxDelay());
195
196 // When an external delay estimate is available, use that delay as the
197 // initial render buffer delay.
198 ApplyTotalDelay(audio_buffer_delay_to_set);
199 delay_ = ComputeDelay();
200
201 external_audio_buffer_delay_verified_after_reset_ = false;
202 } else {
203 // If an external delay estimate is not available, use that delay as the
204 // initial delay. Set the render buffer delays to the default delay.
205 ApplyTotalDelay(config_.delay.default_delay);
206
207 // Unset the delays which are set by AlignFromDelay.
208 delay_ = absl::nullopt;
209 }
210}
211
212// Inserts a new block into the render buffers.
213RenderDelayBuffer::BufferingEvent RenderDelayBufferImpl::Insert(
214 const std::vector<std::vector<std::vector<float>>>& block) {
215 ++render_call_counter_;
216 if (delay_) {
217 if (!last_call_was_render_) {
218 last_call_was_render_ = true;
219 num_api_calls_in_a_row_ = 1;
220 } else {
221 if (++num_api_calls_in_a_row_ > max_observed_jitter_) {
222 max_observed_jitter_ = num_api_calls_in_a_row_;
223 RTC_LOG_V(delay_log_level_)
224 << "New max number api jitter observed at render block "
225 << render_call_counter_ << ": " << num_api_calls_in_a_row_
226 << " blocks";
227 }
228 }
229 }
230
231 // Increase the write indices to where the new blocks should be written.
232 const int previous_write = blocks_.write;
233 IncrementWriteIndices();
234
235 // Allow overrun and do a reset when render overrun occurrs due to more render
236 // data being inserted than capture data is received.
237 BufferingEvent event =
238 RenderOverrun() ? BufferingEvent::kRenderOverrun : BufferingEvent::kNone;
239
240 // Detect and update render activity.
241 if (!render_activity_) {
242 render_activity_counter_ += DetectActiveRender(block[0][0]) ? 1 : 0;
243 render_activity_ = render_activity_counter_ >= 20;
244 }
245
246 // Insert the new render block into the specified position.
247 InsertBlock(block, previous_write);
248
249 if (event != BufferingEvent::kNone) {
250 Reset();
251 }
252
253 return event;
254}
255
256void RenderDelayBufferImpl::HandleSkippedCaptureProcessing() {
257 if (update_capture_call_counter_on_skipped_blocks_) {
258 ++capture_call_counter_;
259 }
260}
261
262// Prepares the render buffers for processing another capture block.
263RenderDelayBuffer::BufferingEvent
264RenderDelayBufferImpl::PrepareCaptureProcessing() {
265 RenderDelayBuffer::BufferingEvent event = BufferingEvent::kNone;
266 ++capture_call_counter_;
267
268 if (delay_) {
269 if (last_call_was_render_) {
270 last_call_was_render_ = false;
271 num_api_calls_in_a_row_ = 1;
272 } else {
273 if (++num_api_calls_in_a_row_ > max_observed_jitter_) {
274 max_observed_jitter_ = num_api_calls_in_a_row_;
275 RTC_LOG_V(delay_log_level_)
276 << "New max number api jitter observed at capture block "
277 << capture_call_counter_ << ": " << num_api_calls_in_a_row_
278 << " blocks";
279 }
280 }
281 }
282
283 if (DetectExcessRenderBlocks()) {
284 // Too many render blocks compared to capture blocks. Risk of delay ending
285 // up before the filter used by the delay estimator.
286 RTC_LOG_V(delay_log_level_)
287 << "Excess render blocks detected at block " << capture_call_counter_;
288 Reset();
289 event = BufferingEvent::kRenderOverrun;
290 } else if (RenderUnderrun()) {
291 // Don't increment the read indices of the low rate buffer if there is a
292 // render underrun.
293 RTC_LOG_V(delay_log_level_)
294 << "Render buffer underrun detected at block " << capture_call_counter_;
295 IncrementReadIndices();
296 // Incrementing the buffer index without increasing the low rate buffer
297 // index means that the delay is reduced by one.
298 if (delay_ && *delay_ > 0)
299 delay_ = *delay_ - 1;
300 event = BufferingEvent::kRenderUnderrun;
301 } else {
302 // Increment the read indices in the render buffers to point to the most
303 // recent block to use in the capture processing.
304 IncrementLowRateReadIndices();
305 IncrementReadIndices();
306 }
307
308 echo_remover_buffer_.SetRenderActivity(render_activity_);
309 if (render_activity_) {
310 render_activity_counter_ = 0;
311 render_activity_ = false;
312 }
313
314 return event;
315}
316
317// Sets the delay and returns a bool indicating whether the delay was changed.
318bool RenderDelayBufferImpl::AlignFromDelay(size_t delay) {
319 RTC_DCHECK(!config_.delay.use_external_delay_estimator);
320 if (!external_audio_buffer_delay_verified_after_reset_ &&
321 external_audio_buffer_delay_ && delay_) {
322 int difference = static_cast<int>(delay) - static_cast<int>(*delay_);
323 RTC_LOG_V(delay_log_level_)
324 << "Mismatch between first estimated delay after reset "
325 "and externally reported audio buffer delay: "
326 << difference << " blocks";
327 external_audio_buffer_delay_verified_after_reset_ = true;
328 }
329 if (delay_ && *delay_ == delay) {
330 return false;
331 }
332 delay_ = delay;
333
334 // Compute the total delay and limit the delay to the allowed range.
335 int total_delay = MapDelayToTotalDelay(*delay_);
336 total_delay =
337 std::min(MaxDelay(), static_cast<size_t>(std::max(total_delay, 0)));
338
339 // Apply the delay to the buffers.
340 ApplyTotalDelay(total_delay);
341 return true;
342}
343
344void RenderDelayBufferImpl::SetAudioBufferDelay(int delay_ms) {
345 if (!external_audio_buffer_delay_) {
346 RTC_LOG_V(delay_log_level_)
347 << "Receiving a first externally reported audio buffer delay of "
348 << delay_ms << " ms.";
349 }
350
351 // Convert delay from milliseconds to blocks (rounded down).
352 external_audio_buffer_delay_ = delay_ms / 4;
353}
354
355bool RenderDelayBufferImpl::HasReceivedBufferDelay() {
356 return external_audio_buffer_delay_.has_value();
357}
358
359// Maps the externally computed delay to the delay used internally.
360int RenderDelayBufferImpl::MapDelayToTotalDelay(
361 size_t external_delay_blocks) const {
362 const int latency_blocks = BufferLatency();
363 return latency_blocks + static_cast<int>(external_delay_blocks);
364}
365
366// Returns the delay (not including call jitter).
367int RenderDelayBufferImpl::ComputeDelay() const {
368 const int latency_blocks = BufferLatency();
369 int internal_delay = spectra_.read >= spectra_.write
370 ? spectra_.read - spectra_.write
371 : spectra_.size + spectra_.read - spectra_.write;
372
373 return internal_delay - latency_blocks;
374}
375
376// Set the read indices according to the delay.
377void RenderDelayBufferImpl::ApplyTotalDelay(int delay) {
378 RTC_LOG_V(delay_log_level_)
379 << "Applying total delay of " << delay << " blocks.";
380 blocks_.read = blocks_.OffsetIndex(blocks_.write, -delay);
381 spectra_.read = spectra_.OffsetIndex(spectra_.write, delay);
382 ffts_.read = ffts_.OffsetIndex(ffts_.write, delay);
383}
384
385void RenderDelayBufferImpl::AlignFromExternalDelay() {
386 RTC_DCHECK(config_.delay.use_external_delay_estimator);
387 if (external_audio_buffer_delay_) {
388 const int64_t delay = render_call_counter_ - capture_call_counter_ +
389 *external_audio_buffer_delay_;
390 const int64_t delay_with_headroom =
391 delay - config_.delay.delay_headroom_samples / kBlockSize;
392 ApplyTotalDelay(delay_with_headroom);
393 }
394}
395
396// Inserts a block into the render buffers.
397void RenderDelayBufferImpl::InsertBlock(
398 const std::vector<std::vector<std::vector<float>>>& block,
399 int previous_write) {
400 auto& b = blocks_;
401 auto& lr = low_rate_;
402 auto& ds = render_ds_;
403 auto& f = ffts_;
404 auto& s = spectra_;
405 const size_t num_bands = b.buffer[b.write].size();
406 const size_t num_render_channels = b.buffer[b.write][0].size();
407 RTC_DCHECK_EQ(block.size(), b.buffer[b.write].size());
408 for (size_t band = 0; band < num_bands; ++band) {
409 RTC_DCHECK_EQ(block[band].size(), num_render_channels);
410 RTC_DCHECK_EQ(b.buffer[b.write][band].size(), num_render_channels);
411 for (size_t ch = 0; ch < num_render_channels; ++ch) {
412 RTC_DCHECK_EQ(block[band][ch].size(), b.buffer[b.write][band][ch].size());
413 std::copy(block[band][ch].begin(), block[band][ch].end(),
414 b.buffer[b.write][band][ch].begin());
415 }
416 }
417
418 if (render_linear_amplitude_gain_ != 1.f) {
419 for (size_t band = 0; band < num_bands; ++band) {
420 for (size_t ch = 0; ch < num_render_channels; ++ch) {
421 for (size_t k = 0; k < 64; ++k) {
422 b.buffer[b.write][band][ch][k] *= render_linear_amplitude_gain_;
423 }
424 }
425 }
426 }
427
428 std::array<float, kBlockSize> downmixed_render;
429 render_mixer_.ProduceOutput(b.buffer[b.write][0], downmixed_render);
430 render_decimator_.Decimate(downmixed_render, ds);
431 data_dumper_->DumpWav("aec3_render_decimator_output", ds.size(), ds.data(),
432 16000 / down_sampling_factor_, 1);
433 std::copy(ds.rbegin(), ds.rend(), lr.buffer.begin() + lr.write);
434 for (size_t channel = 0; channel < b.buffer[b.write][0].size(); ++channel) {
435 fft_.PaddedFft(b.buffer[b.write][0][channel],
436 b.buffer[previous_write][0][channel],
437 &f.buffer[f.write][channel]);
438 f.buffer[f.write][channel].Spectrum(optimization_,
439 s.buffer[s.write][channel]);
440 }
441}
442
443bool RenderDelayBufferImpl::DetectActiveRender(
444 rtc::ArrayView<const float> x) const {
445 const float x_energy = std::inner_product(x.begin(), x.end(), x.begin(), 0.f);
446 return x_energy > (config_.render_levels.active_render_limit *
447 config_.render_levels.active_render_limit) *
448 kFftLengthBy2;
449}
450
451bool RenderDelayBufferImpl::DetectExcessRenderBlocks() {
452 bool excess_render_detected = false;
453 const size_t latency_blocks = static_cast<size_t>(BufferLatency());
454 // The recently seen minimum latency in blocks. Should be close to 0.
455 min_latency_blocks_ = std::min(min_latency_blocks_, latency_blocks);
456 // After processing a configurable number of blocks the minimum latency is
457 // checked.
458 if (++excess_render_detection_counter_ >=
459 config_.buffering.excess_render_detection_interval_blocks) {
460 // If the minimum latency is not lower than the threshold there have been
461 // more render than capture frames.
462 excess_render_detected = min_latency_blocks_ >
463 config_.buffering.max_allowed_excess_render_blocks;
464 // Reset the counter and let the minimum latency be the current latency.
465 min_latency_blocks_ = latency_blocks;
466 excess_render_detection_counter_ = 0;
467 }
468
469 data_dumper_->DumpRaw("aec3_latency_blocks", latency_blocks);
470 data_dumper_->DumpRaw("aec3_min_latency_blocks", min_latency_blocks_);
471 data_dumper_->DumpRaw("aec3_excess_render_detected", excess_render_detected);
472 return excess_render_detected;
473}
474
475// Computes the latency in the buffer (the number of unread sub-blocks).
476int RenderDelayBufferImpl::BufferLatency() const {
477 const DownsampledRenderBuffer& l = low_rate_;
478 int latency_samples = (l.buffer.size() + l.read - l.write) % l.buffer.size();
479 int latency_blocks = latency_samples / sub_block_size_;
480 return latency_blocks;
481}
482
483// Increments the write indices for the render buffers.
484void RenderDelayBufferImpl::IncrementWriteIndices() {
485 low_rate_.UpdateWriteIndex(-sub_block_size_);
486 blocks_.IncWriteIndex();
487 spectra_.DecWriteIndex();
488 ffts_.DecWriteIndex();
489}
490
491// Increments the read indices of the low rate render buffers.
492void RenderDelayBufferImpl::IncrementLowRateReadIndices() {
493 low_rate_.UpdateReadIndex(-sub_block_size_);
494}
495
496// Increments the read indices for the render buffers.
497void RenderDelayBufferImpl::IncrementReadIndices() {
498 if (blocks_.read != blocks_.write) {
499 blocks_.IncReadIndex();
500 spectra_.DecReadIndex();
501 ffts_.DecReadIndex();
502 }
503}
504
505// Checks for a render buffer overrun.
506bool RenderDelayBufferImpl::RenderOverrun() {
507 return low_rate_.read == low_rate_.write || blocks_.read == blocks_.write;
508}
509
510// Checks for a render buffer underrun.
511bool RenderDelayBufferImpl::RenderUnderrun() {
512 return low_rate_.read == low_rate_.write;
513}
514
515} // namespace
516
517RenderDelayBuffer* RenderDelayBuffer::Create(const EchoCanceller3Config& config,
518 int sample_rate_hz,
519 size_t num_render_channels) {
520 return new RenderDelayBufferImpl(config, sample_rate_hz, num_render_channels);
521}
